Max Ian Schöpe received the B.Eng. degree in electrical engineering from the Uni- versity of Applied Sciences in Hamburg, Germany, in February 2015. Subsequently, he started the M.Sc. program of telecommunication and sensing systems at TU Delft, the Netherlands, which he finished in October 2017. After his graduation, he started as a Ph.D. student in the Microwave Sensing, Signals and Systems group of TU Delft.
